title: Who left The Circle last night after the latest blocking?
text:
Who left the show? (Pictures: Channel 4)

Viewers watched another player leave the show last night The Circle as the action hots up inside the apartment.

The show saw two new players enter the game this week, followed by a third last night, but with all these hellos also came a goodbye.

Viewers watched the player leave last night after they were voted off on Thursday. Who left? Read on to find out…

Who was blocked on The Circle?

Katie was pretending to be her own son, Jay (Picture: Channel 4)

Jay was voted off.

It was up to Tim Wilson and Ella May to choose who was to leave, after they were made influencers, with the blocking seen on Thursday night’s show and the aftermath on the live show on Friday night.

It was Ella’s first time as an influencer and the fourth time in a row for Tim.

Advertisement

Advertisement

When it came time to decide who to block, Tim said: ‘We have chosen the player we think sadly has no more to give to The Circle. The player we have chosen is Jay.’

Who was Jay from the Circle?

‘Jay’ was really 43-year-old Katie Roe Carr, the real-life Jay’s mum who had been secretly playing the game as her son.

‘Jay’ might’ve fooled many people, but not Tim.

Viewers dubbed him a wizard as he let slip suspicions that ‘Jay’ wasn’t who they were making out to be.

‘Jay’ got to meet one of the other contestants as she leaves, and she chose ‘Sammie’ – who’s ALSO a catfish called James.

The Circle continues Sundays and weekdays at 10pm on Channel 4

MORE: The Circle reveals game-changing ratings twist as new arrival Paddy Smyth joins the show

MORE: The Circle recap: ‘Jay’ gets blocked as the ratings result is revealed
description: Channel 4's The Circle blocked its third person this week but who left the show?
